comments:
I am receiving the following Null Pointer Exception on disposal of a Tree based 
View.  I am running Eclipse M6 release.

Note, is it possible I failed to clean something up? If so, hopefully there are 
more clues as to the problem.

I located the problem.  

Due to an error in a dispose routine -at the root(the best possible place :-), 
I failed to dispose all of the children in the content provider.

Not sure how a failure to dispose the object model could cause the error below.

Are you able to provide a stand-alone snippet that shows the problem 
happening?  We should not NPE, regardless of what the client does.

I've spent part of the morning trying to reproduce it.  It looks like something 
must have corrupted when the workspace was storing state.  It appears that once 
I cleaned up dispose, the corruption was corrected.

I've re-disabled the poor dispose code, and I can't reproduce the problem at 
all now.  :(

If I come across a reproducable snippet, I'll be sure to post.

Changing bug status for now.  If you find out what happened on your end then 
feel free to reopen this report.
